newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine 3-mo bill yields fall,9-mo up vs last sale.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine 3-mo bill yields fall,9-mo up vs last sale.

text.p: The average yield at the latest auction of three-month discount treasury bills stood at 57.14 percent, down slightly from 57.30 percent at the last sale on August 16, a Ukrainian central bank official said on Friday.
The results of Tuesday's auction, compared to the last issue of three-month T-bills, were as follows:
Auction Number 117 113
Issue date August 20, 1996 August 16, 1996
Maturity date November 20, 1996 November 15, 1996
Denominations 10 million UAK 10 million UAK
Amount sold 2.098 trillion UAK 3.362 trillion UAK
Actual amount raised 1.836 trillion UAK 2.942 trillion UAK
Average yield 57.14 pct 57.30 pct
Average price 8.753 million UAK 8.750 million UAK
Cut-off price 8.750 million UAK 8.750 million UAK
Ukraine's central bank sold 209,855 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The next auction of discount three-month T-bills will be August 22.
The average yield at the latest auction of six-month discount treasury bills stood at 59.90 percent, the same as at the last sale on August 16, a central bank statement said.
The results of Tuesday's auction, compared to the last issue of six-month discount T-bills, were as follows:
Auction Number 118 114
Issue date August 20, 1996 August 16, 1996
Maturity date February 19, 1997 February 14, 1997
Denominations 10 million UAK 10 million UAK
Amount sold 79.37 billion UAK 74.00 million UAK
Actual amount raised 61.11 billion UAK 57.00 million UAK
Average yield 59.90 pct 59.90 pct
Average price 7.700 million UAK 7.700 million UAK
Cut-off price 7.700 million UAK 7.700 million UAK
The central bank sold 7,937 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of six-month discount T-bills is August 22.
The average yield at the latest auction of nine-month discount treasury bills stood at 56.21 percent, up from 55.14 percent at the last sale on August 16, a central bank statement said.
The results of Tuesday's auction, compared to the last issue of nine-month discount T-bills, were as follows:
Auction Number 119 115
Issue date August 20, 1996 August 16, 1996
Maturity date May 21, 1997 May 16, 1997
Denominations 10 million UAK 10 million UAK
Amount sold 770 million UAK 3.95 trillion UAK
Actual amount raise 542 million UAK 2.80 million UAK
Average yield 56.21 pct 55.14 pct
Average price 7.04 million UAK 7.08 million UAK
Cut-off price 7.04 million UAK 7.08 million UAK
The central bank sold 77 T-bills of which 25 were competitive and 52 were non-competitive, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of nine-month discount T-bills is August 22. --Kiev newsroom, +380 44 229-2264
